channel.title: Comments on: Sony not done with acquisitions, says PlayStation Studios head Hermen Hulst “We are open always to building new relationships or bringing people in-house, but only if we adhere to the quality-first mentality & the right kind of innovative content”

item.title: By: 0shadowstories
item.dc:creator: 0shadowstories
item.description:
Lucid Games being next makes the most sense imo
I can also see them expanding their VR studios more by buying Camoflaj, Polyarc, etc
Sony seems keen on buying up the studios they have association with so these all make sense to me.
